Hi Sarah,

Thanks for your request.

We're doing a bunch of work behind the scenes on Kodilo so I've asked to review everything before it goes out.

The team has updated the Refund and Returns Policy page as follows:

  1. Title updated to: REFUND, RETURNS AND WARRANTY POLICY
  2. New clause added for the return of sales items
  3. Warranty section added with details and link to Alder’s site.

We’ve also updated the URL slug from /refund_returns  to /refund-returns-warranty-policy  for SEO purposes and set up a redirect to ensure visitors so any people hitting the old link are automatically sent to the updated page.

Here is the new link for your review:
https://kodilo.com.au/refund-returns-warranty-policy/

You can also test the old link redirect here:
https://kodilo.com.au/refund_returns

I'll send you another update this afternoon on the other things we spoke about.

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Andy Crebar

full_threads.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thanks for your request. We've updated the Refund and Returns Policy page as follows:
  1. Title updated to: REFUND, RETURNS AND WARRANTY POLICY
  2. New clause added for the return of sales items
  3. Warranty section added with details and link to Alder’s site.
We’ve also updated the URL slug from /refund_returns to /refund-returns-warranty-policy for SEO purposes and set up a redirect to ensure visitors using the old link are automatically sent to the updated page.

Here is the new link for your review:
https://kodilo.com.au/refund-returns-warranty-policy/

You can also test the old link redirect here:
https://kodilo.com.au/refund_returns

Let us know if you'd like any further changes.
Best,
Alliana

(Time:15mins)
@allieB - please draft the reply and let me send it (VIP and other conversation in process)

full_threads.body:
Hi team

Can you please make three updates to the Refund and Returns Policy page on Kodilo site.

Page link - Refund and Returns Policy - kodilo

Change 1 - Update the title of the page to - REFUND, RETURNS AND WARRANTY POLICY

Change 2 - Add new Clause re: return of Sale items
I'd like to return a Sale item. Is this possible?
Sale items cannot be returned or exchanged. A sale item is a final sale. Please choose your products carefully if they are on sale before you finalise the purchase. If you are unhappy with the products you received, please contact our management team at sales@kodilo.com.au to discuss your concerns further.
Change 3 - Add new Warranty Clause
What are the Warranty details?
Warranty is supported by the manufacturer of the products. For details of the warranty provided by Alder for Alder Tapware and Vito Bertoni brands please see the Warranty details on their website www.aldertapware.com.au.
To raise a warranty claim please contact Alder directly using the online warranty claim form on the Alder website www.aldertapware.com.au.

Thanks
Sarah Fairweather
General Manager
M 0416 156 447
P 08 6217 0600
